5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: ‘Abdur-Rahman bin Sa’d bin ‘Ammar bin Sa’d said:“My father told me, from his father, from his grandfather, that when the Prophet (ﷺ) went out on the two ‘Eid, he would pass by the house of Sa’eed bin Abul-‘As, then by the people of the tent, then he would leave by a different route, via Banu Zuraiq, then he would go out by the house of ‘Ammar bin Yasir and the house of Abu Hurairah to Balat.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْخُرُوجِ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ مِنْ طَرِيقٍ وَالرُّجُوعِ مِنْ غَيْرِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning going out on the day of ‘Eid via one route and returning via another route
